text: Sonia Rai (born 13 November 1980) born in Himachal Pradesh and brought up in Kangra. She is an Indian shooter, the first Indian pistol shooter to win a World Cup medal in WC Resende, Brazil in 2006. She also won the Silver Medal in 2010 Asian Games in Guangzhou, China. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Indian female sport shooters Category:ISSF pistol shooters Category:Shooters at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Shooters at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Sportswomen from Himachal Pradesh Category:People from Kangra, Himachal Pradesh Category:21st-century Indian women Category:Sport shooters from Himachal Pradesh Category:Asian Games silver medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games
title: Sonia Rai
